channel.title: Does server need a tree farm?
channel.description:
Not sure if anybody will remember a tree farm that I used to have back when there were 3 worlds all locked within 1000x1000. I had an oak tree farm with around 300 trees. I let anybody come for wood and even had a chest for free wood or sapplings. Only requirement was that if you cut something down you had to plant something back. I always make a tree farm within any settlement that I start (currently a man-made cave). Before I get too much going I figure I would like to know if there is a need for this kind of farm again. Back then since there was a limited land it was very useful.
PS: I am a theif of 2 full stacks of carrots, shears, and one stone axe. Just putting it out there.

item.title: Does server need a tree farm?
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

We have a small tree farm located in the spawn town but feel free to build another

Read full topic
item.source: Does server need a tree farm?
